Docs.summary: Converts an collection of UShort number values to and from instances of .

remarks.format:
## Remarks The converted <xref:System.String> is a sequence of delimited UShort values.
This class is only intended to be used by the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupWriter> for serialization of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)].
